caption: Merge Two PDFs using
doc: Merge the entirety of two PDFs together.

ABJ.caption: Merge two PDFs by supplying their URLs.
ABJ.name: info

ABP.caption: Filename
ABP.doc: Name to give your file WITHOUT THE .PDF EXTENSION.
ABP.name: filename

ABv.caption: Use base64 Strings
ABv.doc: Use this checkbox if you want to pass base64 strings (instead of file URLs) to the PDF Merger; this option allows for direct-download of files without needing to save to the database.
ABv.name: use_base64_strings

ABw.caption: Output as base64 String
ABw.doc: Use this checkbox if you want the PDF Merger to output the final, merged file as a base64 string (instead of a file URL that saves to the database); this option allows for direct-download of files without needing to save to the database.
ABw.name: output_as_base64_string

ABx.caption: Direct Download
ABx.doc: Use this checkbox to trigger a download of the merged file once the merging has completed.
ABx.name: direct_download

ABy.caption: Do Not Upload to Database
ABy.doc: Use this checkbox to stop the PDF Merger from uploading the file to your database.
ABy.name: do_not_upload_to_database
